name: StateFarm
0:
”Alexa, open State Farm.”
”What is my Drive Safe and Save discount?”
”Get my agent.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: state farm
Developer Terms of Use
des:
State Farm® helps you protect what matters with surprisingly great rates. And now you can connect with us in a new and convenient way.
 
With State Farm Skill for Amazon Alexa, you can:
· Get your Drive Safe & Save™ discount.*
· Find agents by ZIP Code.
· Get your agent’s address and contact information.*
· Get an insurance card by mail.*
 
* Requires linking to your State Farm account. After enabling the skill, link your account by selecting “Settings” and then “Link Account.” To get online account access, visit statefarm.com, select “Log In” and then “Create an Account.”
 
Additional capabilities are coming soon, so check back often.
 
Manage your State Farm accounts with our mobile app, at statefarm.com, or by calling 800-STATE-FARM. Like a good neighbor, State Farm is there.®
